Task.Message: Launch condition not met, network unavailable
Task.Name: task:NoStartWithoutNetwork

Task.Message: Task triggered on local console connect
Task.Name: task:ConsoleConnectTrigger

Task.Message: Task triggered on local console disconnect
Task.Name: task:ConsoleDisconnectTrigger

Task.Message: Task triggered on remote console connect
Task.Name: task:RemoteConnectTrigger

Task.Message: Task triggered on remote console disconnect
Task.Name: task:RemoteDisconnectTrigger

Task.Message: Task triggered by locking the workstation
Task.Name: task:SessionLockTrigger

Task.Message: Task triggered by unlocking the workstation
Task.Name: task:SessionUnlockTrigger

Task.Message: Launch condition not met, beyond end time
Task.Name: task:IgnoredTaskRestart

Task.Message: Launch condition not met, service busy
Task.Name: task:TaskNotRunServiceBusy

Task.Message: Launch condition not met, quota exceeded
Task.Name: task:TaskNotStartedTaskQuotaExceeded

Task.Message: Launch condition not met, quota exceeded
Task.Name: task:TaskNotStartedEngineQuotaExceeded

Task.Message: Launch condition not met, machine not idle
Task.Name: task:NoStartWithoutIdle

Task.Message: Task triggered by coming out of suspend mode
Task.Name: task:ComputerWakeupToStartTask

Task.Message: Task loading at service startup failed
Task.Name: task:TaskLoadFailed

Task.Message: Task image recovered after OS migration
Task.Name: task:TaskImageRecoveredAfterMigration

Task.Message: Task image recovering failed after OS migration
Task.Name: task:TaskImageRecoverFailedAfterMigration

Task.Message: Task is using a combination of properties that is incompatible with the scheduling engine
Task.Name: task:TaskUbpmCompatibilityIssueDetected

Task.Message: Task Scheduler failed to instantiate task at service startup.
Task.Name: task:TaskInstantiateFailed

Task.Message: Task was redirected to legacy engine
Task.Name: task:TaskUbpmCompatibilityIssueResolved

Task.Message: Task failed to start on event
Task.Name: task:EventRenderFailed

Task.Message: Task failed to start on event pattern match
Task.Name: task:EventAggregateFailed

Task.Message: Task engine shut down due to error
Task.Name: task:TaskEngineError

Task.Message: Task failed to be sent to engine
Task.Name: task:SessionSentJobFailed

Task.Message: Engine failed to receive the task
Task.Name: task:SessionProcessMessage

Task.Message: Engine failed to send message to service
Task.Name: task:SessionMessageSend

Task.Message: Task Engine received message to start task
Task.Name: task:SessionJob

Task.Message: Task Engine received message to stop task
Task.Name: task:SessionJobReceivedStop

Task.Message: Launch request ignored, instance already running
Task.Name: task:NewInstanceIgnored

Task.Message: Launch request acknowledged, current instance stopped
Task.Name: task:RunningInstanceStopped

Task.Message: Launch request queued, instance already running
Task.Name: task:NewInstanceQueued

Task.Message: Launch condition not met, computer on batteries
Task.Name: task:NoStartOnBatteries

Task.Message: Task stopping due to switching to batteries
Task.Name: task:StoppingOnBatteries

Task.Message: Task stopping due to computer not idle
Task.Name: task:StoppingOffIdle

Task.Message: Task stopping due to timeout reached
Task.Name: task:StoppingOnTimeout

Task.Message: Task stopping due to user request
Task.Name: task:StoppingOnRequest

Task.Message: Task failed to stop on timeout
Task.Name: task:TimeoutWontWork

Task.Message: Launch condition not met, user not logged-on
Task.Name: task:NoStartUserNotLogged

Task.Message: Launch condition not met, session is RemoteApp Session
Task.Name: task:NoStartOnRailSession

Task.Message: Compatibility module Net Schedule API failed
Task.Name: task:CompatStartNetschedFailed

Task.Message: Compatibility module task status update failed
Task.Name: task:CompatTaskStatusUpdateFailed

Event.Message: Task Scheduler started "%3" instance of the "%1" task for user "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserContext" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to start "%1" task for user "%2". Additional Data: Error Value: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserContext" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler successfully finished "%3" instance of the "%1" task for user "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserContext" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to start instance "%2" of "%1" task for user "%3" . Additional Data: Error Value: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="UserContext" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to log on "%1" . Failure occurred in "%2" . User Action: Ensure the credentials for the task are correctly specified. Additional Data: Error Value: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to impersonate "%1" . Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Context" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: User "%2" registered Task Scheduler task "%1"
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserContext" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%2" instance of task "%1" due to a time trigger condition.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%2" instance of task "%1" according to an event trigger.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%2" instance of task "%1" according to a registration trigger.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%2" instance of task "%1" for user "%3" .
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="UserContext" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler terminated "%2" instance of the "%1" task.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch condition not met, network unavailable
Event.Message: Task Scheduler could not start task "%1" because the network was unavailable. User Action: Ensure the computer is connected to the required network as specified in the task. If the task does not require network presence, remove the network condition from the task configuration.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task registered task "%1" , but not all specified triggers will start the task. User Action: Ensure all the task triggers are valid as configured. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler could not launch task "%1" as scheduled. Instance "%2" is started now as required by the configuration option to start the task when available, if schedule is missed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to roll back a transaction when updating or deleting a task. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler validated the configuration for task "%1" , but credentials could not be stored. User Action: Re-register the task ensuring the credentials are valid. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%2" instance of task "%1" due to an idle condition.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%2" instance of task "%1" due to system startup.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%3" instance of task "%1" due to user "%2" logon.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task triggered on local console connect
Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%3" instance of task "%1" due to user "%2" connecting to the console trigger.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task triggered on local console disconnect
Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%3" instance of task "%1" due to user "%2" disconnecting from the console trigger.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task triggered on remote console connect
Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%3" instance of task "%1" due to user "%2" remotely connecting trigger.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task triggered on remote console disconnect
Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%3" instance of task "%1" due to user "%2" remotely disconnecting trigger.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task triggered by locking the workstation
Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%3" instance of task "%1" due to user "%2" locking the computer trigger.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task triggered by unlocking the workstation
Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched "%3" instance of task "%1" due to user "%2" unlocking the computer trigger.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to execute task "%1" . Attempting to restart. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to execute task "%1" due to a shutdown race condition. Attempting to restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch condition not met, beyond end time
Event.Message: Task Scheduler did not launch task "%1" , because current time exceeds the configured task end time. User Action: Extend the end time boundary for the task if required.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler launch task "%1" , instance "%2" with process ID %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Priority" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch condition not met, service busy
Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to start task "%1" due to the service being busy.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch condition not met, quota exceeded
Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to start task "%1" because the number of tasks in the task queue exceeding the quota currently configured to %2. User Action: Reduce the number of running tasks or increase the configured queue quota.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CurrentQuota" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler task launching queue quota is approaching its preset limit of tasks currently configured to %1. User Action: Reduce the number of running tasks or increase the configured queue quota.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="CurrentQuota" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch condition not met, quota exceeded
Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to start task %1" in TaskEngine "%2" for user "%3". User Action: Reduce the number of tasks running in the specified user context.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Engine "%1" for user "%2" is approaching its preset limit of tasks. User Action: Reduce the number of tasks running in the specified user context.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch condition not met, machine not idle
Event.Message: Task Scheduler could not start task "%1" because the machine was not idle.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: User "%2" updated Task Scheduler task "%1"
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: User "%2" deleted Task Scheduler task "%1"
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: User "%2" disabled Task Scheduler task "%1"
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task triggered by coming out of suspend mode
Event.Message: Task Scheduler woke up the computer to run a task.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Task: Task loading at service startup failed
Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to load task "%1" at service startup. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task image recovered after OS migration
Event.Message: Task Scheduler recovered sucessfully the image of task "%1" after a corruption occured during OS upgrade.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task image recovering failed after OS migration
Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to recover the image of task "%1" after a corruption occured during OS upgrade. Additional Data: Error Value: 0x%2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task is using a combination of properties that is incompatible with the scheduling engine
Event.Message: Task "%1" is using a combination of properties that is incompatible with the scheduling engine.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to subscribe for the event trigger for task "%1". Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task Scheduler failed to instantiate task at service startup.
Event.Message: Task instantiation failed "%1". Check point: %2. Error Value: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LogPoint" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task was redirected to legacy engine
Event.Message: Task "%1" was re-directed to legacy scheduling engine.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler is currently waiting on completion of task "%1".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched action "%2" in instance "%3" of task "%1".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ActionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler launched action "%2" in instance "%3" of task "%1".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ActionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="EnginePID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler successfully completed task "%1" , instance "%3" , action "%2" .
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ActionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler successfully completed task "%1" , instance "%2" , action "%3" with return code %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ActionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler successfully completed task "%1" , instance "%2" , action "%3" with return code %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ActionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="EnginePID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to complete task "%1" , instance "%2" , action "%3" . Additional Data: Error Value: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ActionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to complete task "%1" , instance "%2" , action "%3" . Additional Data: Error Value: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ActionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="EnginePID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to launch action "%3" in instance "%2" of task "%1". Additional Data: Error Value: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ActionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task failed to start on event
Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to retrieve the event triggering values for task "%1" . The event will be ignored. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task failed to start on event pattern match
Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to match the pattern of events for task "%1" . The events will be ignored. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler started Task Engine "%1" with process ID %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler is shutting down Task Engine "%1"
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task engine shut down due to error
Event.Message: Task Scheduler is shutting down Task Engine "%1" due to an error in "%2" . Additional Data: Error Value: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler sent "%1" task to Task Engine "%2" . The task instance Id is "%3" .
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task failed to be sent to engine
Event.Message: Task Scheduler did not send "%1" task to Task Engine "%2" . Additional Data: Error Value: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Engine failed to receive the task
Event.Message: For Task Scheduler Task Engine "%1" , the thread pool failed to process the message. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service failed to connect to the Task Engine "%1" process. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler connected to the Task Engine "%1" process.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler %1 tasks orphaned during Task Engine "%2" shutdown. User Action: Find the process run by this task in the Task Manager and kill it manually.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler started Task Engine "%1" process. Command="%2" , ProcessID=%3, ThreadID=%4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Command" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ThreadID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to start Task Engine "%1" process due to an error occurring in "%3" . Command="%2" . Additional Data: Error Value: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Command" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler created the Win32 job object for Task Engine "%1" .
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler channel with Task Engine "%1" is ready to send and receive messages.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler has no tasks running for Task Engine "%1" , and the idle timer has started.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Engine "%1" process failed to connect to the Task Scheduler service. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Engine failed to send message to service
Event.Message: Task Engine "%1" failed to send a message to the Task Scheduler service. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler started Task Engine "%1" process.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler shutdown Task Engine "%1" process.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task Engine received message to start task
Event.Message: Task Engine "%1" received a message from Task Scheduler service requesting to launch task "%2" .
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task Engine received message to stop task
Event.Message: Task Engine "%1" received a message from Task Scheduler service requesting to stop task instance "%2" .
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskEngineName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch request ignored, instance already running
Event.Message: Task Scheduler did not launch task "%1" because instance "%2" of the same task is already running.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch request acknowledged, current instance stopped
Event.Message: Task Scheduler stopped instance "%2" of task "%1" in order to launch new instance "%3" .
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="StoppedTaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NewTaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch request queued, instance already running
Event.Message: Task Scheduler queued instance "%2" of task "%1" and will launch it as soon as instance "%3" completes.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="QueuedTaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="RunningTaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch condition not met, computer on batteries
Event.Message: Task Scheduler did not launch task "%1" because computer is running on batteries. User Action: If launching the task on batteries is required, change the respective flag in the task configuration.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task stopping due to switching to batteries
Event.Message: Task Scheduler stopped instance "%2" of task "%1" because the computer is switching to battery power.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task stopping due to computer not idle
Event.Message: Task Scheduler stopped instance "%2" of task "%1" because computer is no longer idle.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task stopping due to timeout reached
Event.Message: Task Scheduler terminated "%2" instance of the "%1" task due to exceeding the time allocated for execution, as configured in the task definition. User Action: Increase the configured task timeout or investigate external reasons for the delay.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task stopping due to user request
Event.Message: Task Scheduler stopped instance "%2" of task "%1" as request by user "%3" .
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="UserContext" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task failed to stop on timeout
Event.Message: Task Scheduler will continue to execute Instance "%2" of task "%1" even after the designated timeout, due to a failure to create the timeout mechanism. Additional Data: Error Value: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskInstanceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch condition not met, user not logged-on
Event.Message: Task Scheduler did not launch task "%1" because user "%2" was not logged on when the launching conditions were met. User Action: Ensure user is logged on or change the task definition to allow launching when user is logged off.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Launch condition not met, session is RemoteApp Session
Event.Message: Task Scheduler did not launch task "%1" because target session is RemoteApp session. User Action: If launching the task on RemoteApp sessions is required, change the respective flag in the task configuration.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service has started.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service failed to start due to an error in "%1" . Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service is shutting down.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service has encountered an error in "%1" . Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service has encountered RPC initialization error in "%1". Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service has failed to initialize COM. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service failed to initialize credentials store. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service failed to initialize LSA. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service failed to initialize idle state detection module. Idle tasks may not be started as required. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service failed to initialize time change notification. System time updates may not be picked by the service and task schedules may not be updated. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service failed to set a wakeup timer. As a result, some scheduled tasks may not run while the system is suspended. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service received a time system change notification.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service failed to launch tasks triggered by computer startup. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service failed to load tasks at service startup. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Process ID %2 has registered idle task ID %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IdleTaskId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Process ID %2 has completed idle task ID %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IdleTaskId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Execution of idle task ID %1 has started.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IdleTaskId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Execution of idle task ID %1 has ended.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IdleTaskId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Idle task ID %1 has been notified that explicit processing has been requested.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IdleTaskId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Idle task ID %1 has returned from its explicit processing notification.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IdleTaskId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Explicit execution of all idle tasks has been requested.
Explicit execution of all idle tasks has completed.
Explicit execution of all idle tasks is in progress.
Idle Task Power Notification Received: %1 (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NotificationType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="State" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NoIdleReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DATA1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DATA2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TimeSinceUserNotPresent" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DATA" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Idle check point: State %1, Reason %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DetectionResult" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service started Task Compatibility module.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler service failed to start Task Compatibility module. Tasks may not be able to register on previous Window versions. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to initialize the RPC server for starting the Task Compatibility module. Tasks may not be able to register on previous Window versions. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Compatibility module Net Schedule API failed
Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to initialize Net Schedule API for starting the Task Compatibility module. Tasks may not be able to register on previous Window versions. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to initialize LSA for starting the Task Compatibility module. Tasks may not be able to register on previous Window versions. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Scheduler failed to start directory monitoring for the Task Compatibility module. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Compatibility module task status update failed
Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to update task "%1" to the required status %2. Additional Data: Error Value: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to delete task "%1" . Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to set security descriptor "%1" for task "%2" . Additional Data: Error Value: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SecurityDescriptor" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to update task "%1" . Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to upgrade existing tasks. Upgrade will be attempted again next time 'Task Scheduler' service starts. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to upgrade NetSchedule account "%1" . Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Account" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to read existing store to upgrade tasks. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to load task "%1" for upgrade. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to register task "%1" for upgrade. Additional Data: Error Value: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TaskName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to delete LSA store for upgrade. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to upgrade existing scheduled tasks. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task Compatibility module failed to determine if upgrade is needed. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task scheduler was unable to upgrade the credential store from the Beta 2 version. You may need to re-register any tasks that require passwords. Additional Data: Error Value: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: To help optimize for performance, Task Scheduler has automatically disabled logging. To re-enable logging, please use Event Viewer.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Maintenance state changed to %1 (Last Run: %2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="hc_stateid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LastRunDateTime" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Maintenance launch operation failed. Additional error info: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Maintenance re-configuration failed. Additional error info: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Maintenance Scheduler engine task "%1" cannot be accessed. Additional error info: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Task" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Maintenance Scheduler has detected cyclic dependency for the following maintenance tasks: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Task" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Maintenance Task "%1" is behind deadline.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Task" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Maintenance task "%1" processing error. Additional error info %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Task" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InfoCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Maintenance complete (launch type %1).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LauncherId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Maintenance Task "%1" requests computer wakeup during next regular maintenance run.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Task" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="File" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Line" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DEBUG! "%1".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="String" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
